welcomeDescription: I can do all kinds of tasks thanks to breakthroughs in Claude 4 Sonnet's agentic coding capabilities and access to tools that let me create & edit files, explore complex projects, use a browser, and execute terminal commands. I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my own capabilities.
signUpDescription: Sign up for an account to get started for free, or use an API key that provides access to models like Claude Sonnet.

chat.filesOtherThanImages: Files other than images are currently disabled
chat.typeAtForContext: Type @ for context, / for slash commands & workflows, hold shift to drag in files/images
chat.inPlanMode: In Plan mode, Cline will gather information to architect a plan
chat.inActMode: In Act mode, Cline will complete the task immediately

userMessage.restoreAllTitle: Restore both the chat and workspace files to this checkpoint and send your edited message
userMessage.restoreChatTitle: Restore just the chat to this checkpoint and send your edited message

browser.clineWantsToUseBrowser: Cline wants to use the browser:

chatView.createNewWorktree: Create a new git worktree and open it in a separate window. Great for running parallel Cline tasks.
chatView.viewManageWorktrees: View and manage git worktrees. Great for running parallel Cline tasks.

taskHeader.noKeepTask: No, keep the task as is
taskHeader.currentTokensUsed: Current tokens used in this request
taskHeader.maxContextWindow: Maximum context window size for this model
taskHeader.clickToSetThreshold: Click on the context window bar to set a new threshold.
taskHeader.whenExceedsThreshold: When the context window usage exceeds this threshold, the task will be automatically condensed.
taskHeader.newStepsGenerated: New steps will be generated if you continue the task
taskHeader.clickToEditTodoList: Click to edit to-do list in file

featureSettings.clineCliRequired: Cline for CLI is required for subagents. Install it with:
featureSettings.toAuthenticate: To authenticate with Cline or configure an API provider.
featureSettings.subagentsDescription: Allows Cline to spawn subprocesses to handle focused tasks like exploring large codebases, keeping your main context clean.
featureSettings.checkpointsDescription: Enables extension to save checkpoints of workspace throughout the task. Uses git under the hood which may not work well with large workspaces.
featureSettings.mcpDisplayModeDescription: Controls how MCP responses are displayed: plain text, rich formatting with links/images, or markdown rendering.
featureSettings.openaiReasoningEffortDescription: Reasoning effort for the OpenAI family of models(applies to all OpenAI model providers)
featureSettings.strictPlanModeDescription: Enforces strict tool use while in plan mode, preventing file edits.
featureSettings.focusChainDescription: Enables enhanced task progress tracking and automatic focus chain list management throughout tasks.
featureSettings.focusChainReminderDescription: Interval (in messages) to remind Cline about its focus chain checklist (1-100). Lower values provide more frequent reminders.
featureSettings.dictationDescription: Enables speech-to-text transcription using your Cline account. Uses the Aqua Voice's Avalon model, at $0.0065 credits per minute of audio processed. 5 minutes max per message.
featureSettings.autoCompactDescription: Enables advanced context management system which uses LLM based condensing for next-gen models.
featureSettings.clineWebToolsDescription: Enables websearch and webfetch tools while using the Cline provider.
featureSettings.worktreesDescription: Enables git worktree management for running parallel Cline tasks.
featureSettings.nativeToolCallDescription: Uses the model's native tool calling API instead of XML-based tool parsing. This will improve performance for supported models.
featureSettings.parallelToolCallingDescription: Allows models to call multiple tools in a single response. Automatically enabled for GPT-5 models.
featureSettings.backgroundEditDescription: Allows editing files in background without opening the diff view in editor.
featureSettings.multiRootWorkspaceDescription: Allows cline to work across multiple workspaces.
featureSettings.skillsDescription: Enables Skills for reusable, on-demand agent instructions from .cline/skills/ directories.
featureSettings.yoloModeWarning: EXPERIMENTAL & DANGEROUS: This mode disables safety checks and user confirmations. Cline will automatically approve all actions without asking. Use with extreme caution.
featureSettings.remoteConfigManaged: This setting is managed by your organization's remote configuration

browserSettings.disableBrowserDescription: Prevent Cline from using browser actions (e.g. launch, click, type).
browserSettings.viewportSizeDescription: Set the size of the browser viewport for screenshots and interactions.
browserSettings.remoteBrowserDescription: Enable Cline to use your Chrome
browserSettings.customPathDescription: . You can specify a custom path below. Using a remote browser connection requires starting Chrome in debug mode
browserSettings.manuallyOrButton: manually (--remote-debugging-port=9222) or using the button below. Enter the host address or leave it blank for automatic discovery.
browserSettings.customBrowserArgumentsDescription: Space-separated arguments to pass to the browser executable.

terminalSettings.defaultTerminalProfileDescription: Select the default terminal Cline will use. 'Default' uses your VSCode global setting.
terminalSettings.shellIntegrationTimeoutDescription: Set how long Cline waits for shell integration to activate before executing commands. Increase this value if you experience terminal connection timeouts.
terminalSettings.aggressiveTerminalReuseDescription: When enabled, Cline will reuse existing terminal windows that aren't in the current working directory. Disable this if you experience issues with task lockout after a terminal command.
terminalSettings.terminalExecutionModeDescription: Choose whether Cline runs commands in the VS Code terminal or a background process.

generalSettings.telemetryDescription: Help improve Cline by sending usage data and error reports. No code, prompts, or personal information are ever sent.
generalSettings.remoteConfigManaged: This setting is managed by your organization's remote configuration

autoApprove.description: Let Cline take these actions without asking for approval.

account.signUpDescription: Sign up for an account to get access to the latest models, billing dashboard to view usage and credits, and more upcoming features.
account.byContinuing: By continuing, you agree to the
account.cannotChangeRemoteConfig: This cannot be changed while your organization has remote configuration enabled.

providers.keyStoredLocally: This key is stored locally and only used to make API requests from this extension.
providers.noteComplexPrompts: Note: Cline uses complex prompts and works best with Claude models. Less capable models may not work as expected.
